author: larryi
msg: Update ReloadInterceptor to initialize the web.xml dependency using the
file's lastModified() time instead of the current time.  On Win9x, times round
up to the next second.  If we just expanded a war file, then web.xml's
lastModifed() time may exceed the current time.
Simplified DependClassLoader to do the same.

author: larryi
msg: Update to compile with classDebugInfo property added to Jasper's Options.

author: larryi
msg: Add classDebugInfo property to Options.java and related classes.
Update handling so that Jasper can compile classes with debugging

author: larryi
msg: getLongestPrefixMatch() would enter a tight loop if the request URI didn't
map into a context. Now, if a match can't be found it returns null and
a 404 error page will be sent back to the client browser.
